name: The Quantum Die
description:
GMTK Game Jam Entry. Explore the quantum world. The instructions are on audio but here's the lowdown if you're without speakers:

WASD and mouse.  Left click grabs the die, left and right together roll the die. The aim of the game is to get to the door, the one with the massive "exit" sign. Except it's up high and you can't reach it.

Not to worry, you've got a quantum die and some switches to the rescue. Try rolling the die, the world will change depending on the result. 

Tip to get you started: Roll a 4, flick the switch so it turns red, then roll a one. You might be able to make some progress. Sometimes you'll want to knock over the die when rolling is too risky...

Oh, and there's a downloadable version on my account for the proper experience.

Good luck!
